sentences.sContent: How many coaches can that locomotive pull?
sentences.sContent_eng: How many coaches can that locomotive pull?
sentences.sCn: 那个机车能拉多少节客车?。

sentences.sContent: A chamber, such as the furnace of a steam locomotive, in which fuel is burned.
sentences.sContent_eng: A chamber, such as the furnace of a steam locomotive, in which fuel is burned.
sentences.sCn: 火箱，燃烧室一种燃料在里面燃烧的内室，例如蒸汽机车的燃烧室。

sentences.sContent: Displaying some of his versatility, here Iqbal shows an HO electric locomotive, track and signals he made.
sentences.sContent_eng: Displaying some of his versatility, here Iqbal shows an HO electric locomotive, track and signals he made.
sentences.sCn: 展示了他的一些多才多艺，在这里伊克巴尔显示，一何电力机车，轨道和信号，他所作的。

synos.tran: [铁路]火车头的；运动的；移动的

phrases.pCn: 机车发动机；机车蒸汽机

remMethod.val: loco(地方) ＋ mot(移动) ＋ ive → 从一个地方移动到另一个地方 → 机车

words.tran: 好旅行的人；有运动力之物；移动发动机
